Class RationalNumber

java.lang.Object
SpecialNumber
RationalNumber
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable
public class RationalNumber extends SpecialNumber implements Comparable
The `RationalNumber` class represents rational numbers and provides methods for arithmetic operations and comparisons. It extends the `SpecialNumber` class and implements the `Comparable` interface.

      Throws:
